title: NO CHEST AFTER S RANK???
body:
SO recently Ive been playing and Ive gotten an S+ with Soraka, 2(make that 3) S with Heimerdinger and another S with a champion I can't remember... But for some reason NO CHEST!!!
I was eligible to get a chest for all 3 champions but NO Chest!!
Plz help...

replies.body:
You can only get one chest per champion each season, so are you sure you haven't received one for those already? You can see what you've already earned one for by looking for the gold borders on the Champion page in your profile. You also need to have chests available to earn, which you can see on your main profile page on the right.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/203324076/Chest-Earned.jpg
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/203324116/ChestLeft.png

Let me know if none of that explains why you did not receive a chest.

An account can only obtain one chest on a specific champion per season.  I was happy to look into this for you, and found that you've already received chests for these champions before.  We have a [hextech crafting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)guide that provides some more information like eligibility for chests.  Hopefully that clears some things up, but please let me know if you have any questions!

(DTN has provided some great information on verifying champions you already own!)
Ty I didn't know this :p rip
